channel.title: Commands
channel.description: how do i add new commands for my server. i have tried and it didnt work. can someone help me

item.dc:creator: @v_cove_v v cove v
item.description:

guys i already added my commands. thanks alot for the help! it worked aswell

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:10, topic:265531”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=350558.msg2693319#msg2693319 date=1236104251]

[code]You’re wrong.

Code:
playerRights > 0
Is correct, it’s saying, and playerRights is higher then 0. That means 1 or above.[/code]

w/e, i havnt been on the site with all the operaters for ages.

and i normally use: >= or == with most of the commands…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 11:41:15 am[/size][hr][quote author=shadytheone link=topic=350558.msg2693225#msg2693225 date=1236101171]

a few things wrong this post. i actually laughed at some errors.

  1. its public not private

2.if(command.startsWith("runescim") && playerRights > 0) {

that is saying that normal commands can also do it,
1 = mod.

  1. i doubt he is using delta.

he is u can see at the sM
i use sendMessage
delta is bad

also, i never said he wasnt using delta, the guy got the code off a delta source but it actually doesnt say if he is using delta source or not.
[/quote]
That’s not a reason. You should be learning them off by heart or at school.
[/quote]

lol, i keep the site anyway and look over it when i come to commands ect and when i need them and i live in england, we dont learn those kind of stuff in school…[/quote]
I also live in england, it’s math operators, the school should teach you that in Maths.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @ats3 ats3
item.description:
@ats3 wrote:

What command you want to add?
Open up your client.java and search for void customCommand
For example here’s a command what gives you rune scimitar:

if(command.startsWith("runescim")) {
addItem(1333, 1);
}

and here’s the same command mod-only

if(command.startsWith("runescim") && playerRights > 0) {
addItem(1333, 1);
}else{
sM("You need to be moderator to spawn this");
}

Read full topic
